summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.3°C) and outside temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 6992 lux) and cloud levels (up 311 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1891 m), light levels (up 12484 lux), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 311.4m lower than yesterday, 805.2m lower than the past week, 1891.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 755.6m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and near calm conditions. Light to moderate rain is forecast, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. Changeable conditions.
